evidence.claim: Ronin Healthcare utilizes AWS for scalable infrastructure solutions.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure data security in health-tech services.
Utilization of FHIR and HL7 standards for efficient healthcare data exchange is mentioned in their documentation.
They leverage EDI transaction sets for data exchange in healthcare services on their platform.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on X12 transactions and healthcare API solutions aligns with ICP criteria.
